summary: Commercial website for product sales with WhatsApp contact integration, no user authentication required, and admin access for product management
architectural_notes: Public-facing product catalog with no authentication barrier
Separate admin interface for content management
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Hero banner image showing elegant product display setup with warm lighting (hero-banner.dim_1920x600.png)
- Placeholder product image for items without photos, minimalist design (product-placeholder.dim_400x400.png)

existing_features.title: Create a product catalog interface displaying products with images, names, descriptions, and prices in a visually appealing grid layout
Add a prominent WhatsApp contact button on each product that opens WhatsApp with a pre-filled message containing the product name
Implement public product browsing without any sign-up, login, or authentication requirements for visitors
Create an admin panel accessible through Internet Identity that allows adding, editing, and deleting products including their names, descriptions, prices, and images

Design a visually captivating and professional aesthetic using warm, earthy tones (terracotta, sage green, cream) with elegant serif typography for headings and clean sans-serif for body text, creating a modern boutique feel with generous whitespace and subtle shadows

new_feature_requests.summary: Display products with WhatsApp contact button
No sign up or login required for visitors
Admin panel for product and price management
Implement backend data model and CRUD operations for products including fields for name, description, price, image URL, and WhatsApp number
